*Component items*:
  * *Flexor longus digitorum (flexor-longus-digitorum-muscle)*: flex digits
  * *Flexor longus hallucis (flexor-longus-hallucis-muscle)*: flexes all joints of the big toe, plantar flexion of the ankle joint
  * *Gastrocnemius muscle (gastrocnemius-muscle)*: plantar flexion, flexion of knee (minor)
  * *Plantaris muscle (plantaris-muscle)*: plantar flexes foot and flexes knee
  * *Popliteus muscle (popliteus-muscle)*: medial rotation and flexion of knee
  * *Tibialis posterior muscle (tibialis-posterior-muscle)*: inversion of the foot, plantar flexion of the foot at the ankle; key muscle and tendon for stabilization, produce inversion and assists in the plantar flexion of the foot at the ankle
